org.jruyi.io

Class AbstractCodec<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jruyi.io.AbstractCodec<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the object to be encoded/decoded
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICodec<T>

    public abstract class AbstractCodec<T>
extends Object
implements ICodec<T>
    A default ICodec implementation with all methods throwing UnsupportedOperationException.
